name: A181 - West Dapto - ITC 015 (ITP015) - Pavement: HBB, CRS, CRB
template name: A181 - West Dapto - ITC 015 (ITP015) - Pavement: HBB, CRS, CRB

name: • HOLD POINT: Submit the following for the nominated mix and materials – Source of supply, and Certificate of Conformance to 1113
• HOLD POINT: Submission of evidence of material conformance
• WITNESS POINT: Delivered material loads covered to prevent moisture loss, supply delivery dockets for each truck load upon material arrival
• WITNESS POINT: Inspection of material upon delivery to site
• HOLD POINT: Submit details of a Trial Section of HBB placement, two days prior to commencement
• HOLD POINT: Construct a 50m Trial Section to be incorporated into the finished works, submit trial results a minimum two days prior to commencing the remaining works
• HOLD POINT: Submission of HBB compaction results
• HOLD POINT: Submission of the following – Survey report of finished surface levels, Survey report of compacted thickness, Recorded data of straight edge test
• HOLD POINT: Submit the following for each proposed material ten days before delivery – Source of supply, Blend proportions for blended materials, Test results (NATA)
• WITNESS POINT: Inspection of materials at delivery
• HOLD POINT: Construct a 50m Trial Section to be incorporated into the finished works, submit trial results a minimum two days prior to commencing the remaining works
• HOLD POINT: Submission of the following – Survey of completed pavement layer, Compaction and Moisture levels, Proof Roll records, Straight edge test records
QA ENGINEER / SPE / PE SIGN OFF
